amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize the Judicial Conference of the United States to use a portion of the money paid to credit card companies and other unsecured creditors in Chapter 13 cases to pay for the additional costs of administering the new debt collection system the bill would create.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 as printed in House Report 105-573 to authorize the Judicial Conference of the United States to reduce disbursements to unsecureed nonpriority creditors payable in Chapter 13 cases to cover the increased costs to the courts and the U.S. Trustees Office of implementing and administering the means testing system provided for in the bill.

action.text: On agreeing to the Delahunt amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 278 (Roll No. 220).
